item.title: Principles For Data Recovery
item.description: Data Recovery is a complex topic to manage. Recovery Point Objectives are defined by business teams. Not all organisations are convinced that there is a reasonable need to mitigate complex data issues post an extreme disruption such as a cyber attack, this can be evidenced in the following paper created as a joint exercise between SIFMA and Protiviti: Protiviti https://www.protiviti.com/gl-en/insights-paper/principles-for-data-recovery-severe-cyber-scenario
